About Me

I'm a Front End Web Developer currently based in Coventry, UK.

I enjoy bringing ideas to life, solving complex problems and turning them into simple solutions.

When I write my code for a project, I pay attention to making it clean, maintainable, and understandable.

My goal is to become always up to date with new technology and develop skills that allow me to finish given tasks.

As this sector is constantly evolving and changes happen very often, it is interesting and challenging to work as a web developer and be part of a team that solves these challenges.

Interest

When not coding, I like to spend time outside on a bike, especially on warmer days, and on colder days I spin on Zwift. I have a big passion for road cycling and exploring the UK countryside.

I like to work on myself, I read books, meditate, and exercise. These simple changes to my daily routine make my day better and more productive. All knowledge and understanding from these practices are helping me overcome the challenges of the day.
